name: VOOI
description: VOOI is a DeFi super-app designed to unify the fragmented decentralized trading landscape into a single, intuitive platform. Its core function is to aggregate perpetual (perp), spot, and yield markets from leading decentralized exchanges into a seamless, Robinhood-style user experience. Through chain abstraction, VOOI removes the technical barriers of bridges, gas management, and network switching, allowing users to trade, invest, stake, and manage assets across multiple chains from one interface. By simplifying DeFiâ€™s UX/UI and consolidating liquidity, VOOI aims to enable mass adoption of advanced DeFi strategies for both retail and professional users.
